com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion

Class Criterion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion.Criterion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BetweenExpression, BinaryExpression, InExpression, LogicalExpression, NotExpression, NotNullExpression, NullExpression

    public abstract class Criterion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    This class represents a query criterion to refine the results of a Criteria query.

    Version:
    1.0 02/17/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
